title: Calories in White Castle Slider
meta_description: Discover calories in White Castle slider, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 2x2 steamed beef patty slider with bun, diced onions, and pickle; no cheese, ketchup, or additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and customizations; values based on standard menu data. Check White Castle app or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A standard White Castle slider contains about 140 calories with 6 g protein and 15 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a White Castle slider?
faqs.a: Approximately 140 calories for the standard beef slider.

faqs.q: What's the protein in White Castle slider?
faqs.a: About 6 g of protein per slider.

faqs.q: Are White Castle sliders high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 380 mg sodium per slider due to seasoning and bun.

faqs.q: Calories in White Castle cheese slider?
faqs.a: Roughly 200 calories, adding about 60 kcal from the cheese.

faqs.q: Do White Castle sliders have trans fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 0.5 g per slider from the beef and bun.
